thread.title: Fully Online Part-Time Master of Science in Business Analytics Program Launches | Paul Merage School of Business | UCI
thread.title_full: Fully Online Part-Time Master of Science in Business Analytics Program Launches | Paul Merage School of Business | UCI

title: Fully Online Part-Time Master of Science in Business Analytics Program Launches | Paul Merage School of Business | UCI
text:
December 05, 2024 • By UC Irvine Paul Merage School of Business
The Paul Merage School of Business at UC Irvine is proud to announce the launch of Part-Time Online Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) program. This new, flexible program is designed to meet the growing demand for skilled business analytics professionals, offering working professionals the opportunity to advance their careers while maintaining their current commitments.
The MSBA has become one of the school’s most sought-after graduate degrees, and this online part-time program expands access to an even broader audience. With its fully online format, students can earn their degree from anywhere, while still benefiting from the Merage School’s world-class faculty, rigorous curriculum, and extensive industry connections.
Key Features of the Part-Time Online MSBA Program:
“We are thrilled to offer this fully online, part-time option for our popular MSBA program,” said Dean Ian O. Williamson. “This program reflects our commitment to delivering high-quality, flexible educational opportunities that prepare future business leaders to harness the power of data and analytics in an increasingly digital world.”
With the booming demand for data analytics professionals across industries, the Merage School’s Online MSBA prepares students to drive strategic decision-making and uncover insights from vast data sets. This program is ideal for data analysts, marketing experts, and operations professionals seeking to enhance their analytical skills and advance in their careers.
[Learn more](https://merage.uci.edu/landing-pages/part-time-msba-program-landing-page.html) about the Part-Time Online MSBA Program.
Associate Director of Communications
[jrotheku@uci.edu](mailto:jrotheku@uci.edu)
